description: Refurbishment works including amalgamation of units 9 and 10 into a single industrial unit and installation of windows, sectional doors, living green wall and trapezoidal/rainscreen cladding.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): 20-082 SGP ZZ 00 DR A 131100 Rev D; (Proposed ground floor plan units 5-9); 20-082 SGP ZZ 00 DR A 131103 Rev B (Proposed first floor plan units 9-8); 20-082 SGP XX XX DR A 131104 Rev A (Proposed roof plan); 20-082 SGP XX XX DR A 131301 Rev C (Proposed east elevation); 20-082 SGP XX XX DR A 131302 Rev A (Proposed north elevation); 20-082 SGP XX XX DR A 131303 (Proposed west elevation); 20-082 SGP XX XX DR A 131304 Rev A (Proposed south elevation); 20-082 SGP XX XX DR A 131500 Rev A (Proposed material moodboard)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match those indicated in the approved plans or application form. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), London Plan(2021) policies D1, D3 and D4 and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).

| Notwithstanding the approved plans, further details for the green wall construction and specification, including frame and module details, growing medium, planting mix and irrigation, together with a maintenance schedule for at least 5 years. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Any planting that within a period of five years after implementation is removed, dies or becomes seriously damaged or diseased, shall be replaced in the next planting season and all planting shall be replaced with others of a similar size and species and in the same position, unless the Local Planning Authority first gives written consent to any variation.

Reason: In the interest of maintaining a high quality design with urban greening that would improve the visual amenity of the Strategic Industrial Location in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan(2021), the London Environment Strategy(2018) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).

| Secure cycle parking shall be installed prior to first occupation of the development hereby approved.  Cycle provision shall comprise a minimum of 15 long stay and 4 short stay cycle parking spaces, and shall be retained thereafter.

Reason: To ensure adequate cycle parking is provided within the development in pursuance of the good growth objectives of the London Plan (2021), and for encouraging sustainable modes of transport in accordance London Plan (2021) policy T5 and table 10.2

| Refuse and recycling shall be provided within a screened storage area prior to completion of the  development as approved and retained thereafter. These areas shall not thereafter be obstructed or used for any other purpose.

Reason: To ensure that responsible waste management practices are adhered to in the interests of the visual amenity of the area and in accordance with London Plan (2021) policy D3 and T7; policies 7A, 7.4 and 7B of Ealing's adopted Development Management DPD (2013); and (interim) SPG 4: Refuse and Recycling Facilities.
